heading: no rosy romance
subheading: an italian lover and a mountain of roses failed to persuade a woman to reconsider her broken engagement. spurned lover roberto decided to send alessandra 1,480 roses, one for each day the couple had been engaged. he delivered the final blossom on horseback, along with an impassioned plea for alessandra to change her mind. roberto was crushed when she said no, but his grand gesture was worth us$6,000 to a verona florist.
author: wired staff
